channel.title: 317-Delta - Alch prices non-linked to shop prices?
channel.description:
Is there any way possible to create alch prices that are not linked to the shop prices?
For example, I have dungoneering on my server and the chaotics cost 300k duneoneering tokens to buy, meaning their death value is only 100k...

item.title: 317-Delta - Alch prices non-linked to shop prices?
item.dc:creator: @fmcb fmcb
item.description:
@fmcb wrote:

im not sure about this but when you open source>Config>item.config there are two numbers Shop Price and the other might be alching price give that a try

Read full topic
item.source: 317-Delta - Alch prices non-linked to shop prices?
